channel.title: This section is dead
channel.description:
We need more CM-only boards. (i.e general java CM boards, perhaps general programming CM-only boards)?
s/dis/&cuss

item.title: This section is dead
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

[quote=“Krichevskoy, post:11, topic:228550”][quote author=goatee link=topic=300518.msg2412851#msg2412851 date=1220014229]
Why not just have a private board? People who are good at java get invites in? Then they wouldn’t have to get CM just to be able to share their java work privately.
[/quote]

That’s what this was supposed to be. It’s what the analogous board at Kaitnieks was. I don’t know what “Community Member” means now. Nothing personal, but I don’t even know who you are. This is the problem.

Uhm, well I’ve barely been on the site for the past 6 weeks, and looking at activity the board is diminishing.

I’d say every section is dying.

There are too many people, no sense of purpose or community. There are 250847 members here. How can you expect to achieve anything - particularly in stealth, as we have to - while having to deal with that many people, 99% of them clueless?[/quote]QFT

Read full topic

item.title: This section is dead
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

From what I’ve read, it seems like the consensus among those with code and ideas to release is that this board is too democratic. People with workable systems see no reason to share their knowledge because signal-to-noise in the responses is so low. Also, a fair number of the old guru-types have left Runescape with their replacements nowhere in sight.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

Well, I’m pretty sure a lot of CM’s would rather share their work inside these parts of the fora, rather than the public into which any moparscapian moron can get into and post “DUZ DIS GO INT CLINET/JEVA”? Like, I remember a post from a whiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiile ago by regecks in which he says that he shared some of his code with us in the CM board cause we were “the least gay community [he] knew about” (a.k.a., least retarded)
